column1: Topic title: Wan Azizah recovering  says Muhyiddin after visit

column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/377438Wan Azizah recovering, says Muhyiddin after visit29 March 2017Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (Bersatu) president Muhyiddin Yassin today visited PKR president Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail who has been admitted at the Universiti Hospital Medical Centre.According to a photograph posted on Muhyiddin's Facebook page today, he was accompanied by his wife Noorainee Abdul Rahman."Praise be to God, she appears to be recovering and was able to receive us both. Let us all pray for her speedy recovery," wrote Muhyiddin.Wan Azizah was hospitalised on Sunday. Her staffers claimed that her condition was not worrying.Earlier, she had received visits from her husband Anwar Ibrahim, Dr Siti Hasmah Mohd Ali and Selangor Menteri Besar Mohamed Azmin Ali.
